text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump The 911 Commission wasn’t formed to investigate Bush. The needed Coronavirus Commission won’t be formed to investigate trump. Like the former, it will need to be a dissection of the systemic and human flaws that led to catastrophe, so we don’t have a repeat in the future.
